name: Arcane Ascent
description:
This is a game made in under 72 hours for the Lost Cartridge Jam, where you have to make a game that is both designed and stylized to look and feel like a vintage game! For my submission, I worked with a pixel art style with a minimal range of colours, in order to convey the style from the 16-bit era.

Feel free to leave feedback or improvements to the game,

Enjoy playing!

Controls: A/DMoveSpaceJumpLeft/Right ClickAttackEUse(when prompted)
